org.eclipselabs.mongoemf

Interface ValueConverter


  • public interface ValueConverter
    Author:
    bhunt

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object convertEMFValueToMongoDBValue(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EDataType eDataType, java.lang.Object emfValue)
      Convert a value from EMF of the specified type to a value stored in MongoDB.
      java.lang.Object convertMongoDBValueToEMFValue(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EDataType eDataType, java.lang.Object databaseValue)
      Convert a value from MongoDB to a value used by EMF of the specified type.
      boolean isConverterForType(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EDataType eDataType)
      Determines whether or not this converter can convert a value of a specific type.

    • Method Detail

      • convertMongoDBValueToEMFValue

        java.lang.Object convertMongoDBValueToEMFValue(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EDataType eDataType,
                                             java.lang.Object databaseValue)
        Convert a value from MongoDB to a value used by EMF of the specified type. An example might be converting a long read from MongoDB into an EDataType of java.util.Calendar.
        Parameters:
        eDataType - the EMF type that the value needs to be converted to
        databaseValue - the value read from MongoDB
        Returns:
        the value that will be set in the EMF object being built.

      • convertEMFValueToMongoDBValue

        java.lang.Object convertEMFValueToMongoDBValue(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EDataType eDataType,
                                             java.lang.Object emfValue)
        Convert a value from EMF of the specified type to a value stored in MongoDB. An example might be converting an EDataType of java.util.Calendar to a long that is stored in MongoDB
        Parameters:
        eDataType - the EMF type that the value needs to be converted from
        emfValue - the value from the EMF object
        Returns:
        the value that will be stored in MongoDB

      • isConverterForType

        boolean isConverterForType(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EDataType eDataType)
        Determines whether or not this converter can convert a value of a specific type.
        Parameters:
        eDataType - the type of the value that needs to be converted
        Returns:
        true if this converter can handle values of the specified type; false otherwise
